prompt:
Summarize the following resume in 100 words or less:
Mr. Ananth More
Solution Architect / Team Lead
Mobile: 9845501060 | Email: ananthmore21@gmail.com | LinkedIn: Ananth M
Professional Summary
A results-driven Solution Architect with 15 years of experience in Microsoft .NET technologies, Angular, and
Cloud computing (Azure, AWS). Expertise in designing, developing, and scaling enterprise-grade applications
across web, mobile, and desktop platforms (MAUI, Xamarin, WinForms, WPF). Adept at leading cross-
functional teams, optimizing application performance, and implementing modern software architectures
(Microservices, Multi-Tenant, SOA). Passionate about driving technology innovation, aligning solutions with
business objectives. Proficient in Agile methodologies with strong leadership and team collaboration skills.
Continuously enhancing technical knowledge and aligning strategies with business objectives to drive innovation
and optimize performance.
Technical Skills
• Programming and Framework: C# .NET 6/Core/Framework, RESTful APIs, WCF, WinForms,
Angular.
• Mobile and Desktop Platforms: .NET MAUI, Xamarin-Forms, , CAB/SCSF/WPF
• Architecture: Multi-Tenant Architecture, Multi-Tier Architecture, Service-Oriented Architecture (SOA),
Microservices
• Cloud Platforms: Azure Services, Azure DevOps, CI/CD Pipelines, AWS Services(EC2, S3, SNS)
• Databases: MS SQL Server, MongoDB (NoSQL), MySQL, Oracle
• Tools & Utilities: Swagger, Redis Cache, GitHub, App Centre, JIRA, Confluence, TFS, TeamCity,
Tortoise-SVN, Log4cxx, N-Unit, CPP-Unit, SonarQube, Re-sharper, OpenAI. Prompt Engg.
Education
Master of Computer Applications (MCA)
BMS College of Engineering, Bangalore, Karnataka | Apr 2004 – Apr 2007
Bachelor of Computer Applications (BCA)
MDM College, Aurad, Maharashtra | Apr 2001 – Apr 2004
Professional Experience
Victrix Systems and Labs | Oct 2022 – Present
Solution Architect / Team Lead
• Architected and developed scalable cross-platform mobile applications using .NET MAUI.
• Designed Web APIs using .NET Core and integrated
completion: This resume belongs to a candidate with [insert summary based on content, e.g., 5 years of software engineering experience, skilled in Python and Java].
